PositionHistory.Title: Leads/Manger/Architects to mentor the students, set up Exit
PositionHistory.Description:
Project: UST D3 Hackathon 2018.
Public URL: https://deepak-tiwari-ilearn.netlify.com	Themes: Interfaces

Responsibilities: Environment: RESTful Architecture/MEAN Stack
This project I made as part of D3 Hackathon in which I participated	§ AngularJS 1.0.5/Bootstrap 2.2.2.
and got top10 rank out of 560 Teams worldwide.	§ RequireJS/HTML 5/CSS3
Team Size -1	§ ExpressJS/MongoDB
DURATION: 3 Months	(SELF - OWNED)	§ NodeJS,Bower,Grunt,Gulp
§ Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning


Description: The project can be successfully deployed across Accounts in organization where it can be used by Technical
Leads/Manger/Architects to mentor the students, set up Exit criteria's and keep refining the Account level technical needs and standards.
The application is built on AI/ML framework which adds another dimension to the application through inbuilt systems like iMentor and iRecall2Predict which defines career path to associates and suggests them courses and adds gamification to the app by telling them of their
performances as well. It uses the concept like Sentiment Analysis ,Full Text Search ,Recommender Engine ,Automatic Quiz Creation , Web
Scraping the Wiki Pedia content , Chat bots etc.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 60% of this job

CHRONOLOGY OF RECENT PROJECT(S) UNDERTAKEN

COMPANY: Experian, United Kingdom	Project: DATA PATROL
Responsibilities: -
Full Stack Application Engineer / Application Architect / Technical Lead / Development / SME / On-Site Lead
Web-Application System Architect and System Designer focusing on developing huge scalable applications in NodeJS, React JS,
AngularJS, Python, MongoDB, HTML 5, ExpressJS, ES6 / MS Typescript frameworks specially NodeJS and its Packages.
Experience working with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, YARN.
Working with RESTful API's (JSON/XML Web Services) and GraphQL.
Working with Git, Stash, Bit Bucket, Web Hooks, and Nexus.
Experience with SOLID Design Principles of OOPs, Design Patterns like Factory/Observer/Strategy/Proxy and Software Architectural
Design Patterns like Layered/Client-Server/Master-Slave/Pipe-filter/Broker/Peer-to-Peer/Event-bus/MVC/Blackboard Pattern.
Building Serverless REST API in Node.js & MongoDB App and Dockerising it.
Testing AngularJS Apps with Jasmine, Karma, Protractor and React Apps with Jest and Enzyme.
Handling Authentication in MERN Stack using Bearer Token and Session Cookie.
Setting up CI/CD Pipeline for Node.JS app with Jenkins.
Securing Node.JS RESTful APIs with JWT Web Tokens
Knowledge on Micro-services in Spring Boot, Web Sockets and ReactJS and security using JWT.
Doing Data Visualization, Text Classification, Sentiment Analysis and building Chatbots using Python.
Knowledge on Web crawlers and SEO Optimization.
Optimizing ReactJS Apps and Web Performance.

Description: Experian plc is a consumer credit reporting company. Experian collects and aggregates information on over one billion people and
businesses including 235 million individual US consumers and more than 25 million US businesses. In addition to its credit services, Experian also
sells decision analytic and marketing assistance to businesses, including individual fingerprinting and targeting. Its consumer services include
online access to credit history and products meant to protect from fraud and identity theft.


COMPANY: Boots eCommerce, London, United Kingdom	Project: Beautiful You 1.7
Responsiilities: -
Application Architect on Full Stack / Development
Requirement Analysis, Client Interaction
SPA Web Application development using
ReactJS, ES6+, MongoDB, NodeJS, Docker, Azure, AWS, Jenkins.
Performance Tuning and SEO Optimization for Website SERP
Building RESTful APIs, JSON and Multithreaded Web Services.
Design, Development of Microservices and scale using Message Queues, Spring bot and Kubernetes.
Build and Deployment with Continuous Delivery using ReactJS, Docker and Microsoft Azure.
Handling Security, Authentication and Authorization.
Developing Applications on OOPs SOLID Principles.
Desgn and Develop applications using SpringBoot + Spring MVC + Spring Security + MySQL
Working with UX Team to design CSS styles using Layouting/Responsive/Adaptive Design,Specificity and Namespacing.

Description: Boots is the UK's largest pharmacy-led health and beauty chain. Boots UK is part of the Retail Pharmacy International Division of
Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc, the first global pharmacy-led health and wellbeing enterprise.
The Responsibilities were focused in development and maintenance of their Commercial Boots website which offered a catalogue, selection of
various products to be bought online from their stores with option for Online Payment Gateways and Step Door Deliveries.
CHRONOLOGY OF RECENT PROJECT(S) UNDERTAKEN   .contd

COMPANY: Maersk - United Kingdom	Project: Maersk Line
Responsibilities: -
Front End Lead and Senior Developer
Optimization & Benchmarking while developing Application using Full Stack Technologies.
Responsible for automating the daily operations, monitoring, automated installation, configuration and patching of Linux
Application servers, and production application deployment.
System administration for the entire system development lifecycle in a dynamic data searching, indexing services environment.
Full Stack Web Application Development using MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS and NodeJS.
Operationalizing Node.js for Server-side Rendering and Managing Threads in NodeJS.
Improving Performance in ReactJS and NodeJS.
Setting up Continuous Build and Deployment and Delivery using Jenkins, Docker and Azure.
Setting up Authentication for Node.js and MongoDB for a ReactJS App.
Working with APIs using Flask, FlaskRESTPlus and SwaggerUI.
Working with AngularJS 1.5, Webpack, Node and Spring Boots.
Resolving cross-browser/platform issues
Developing dash boarding or charting applications on responsive web / mobile.

Description: Maersk Line, is the largest operating unit in A.P. Moller-Maersk by revenue and staff.Maersk is structured into two main business
segments: transport & logistics and energy. These two branches include several subsidiaries such as container shipping and related activities.
"Container shipping and related activities" is the largest business area for A.P. Moller-Maersk, providing almost half of the group's revenue in 2008.
It comprises worldwide container services, logistics and forwarding and terminal activities under the brand names: Maersk Line, Safmarine,
and Damco.


PROJECT: Disrupt & Move from Reading to Remembering by adding Self-teaching/mentoring capability and gamification to eLearning
systems using Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.
